name: The Porpitrator
description:
Your teeth are razor-sharp. Your thin body and powerful tail make you lightning-quick. You are the ULTIMATE sea predator.

You are...Flippy, the Seamore Aquarium's bottlenose dolphin, famous for the shows you are forced to perform while under the influence of pufferfish poison-laced drugs!

Sick of your treatment, you seek to bring revenge on those who captured you. Swim around and use your biting attack to wreak havoc on the aquarium!
